availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: James J. Parish (Harrison County, Kentucky, master mason.)

body.p: Harrison County, Kentucky, master mason. Kentucky native. Married to Harriett Parish. Father of Gribbon Parish, Mary T. Parish, and Emma E. Parish. Master mason in Cynthiana, Kentucky, in 1860. Owned two enslaved persons in Cynthiana in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Harrison County, Cynthiana, p. 566.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Harrison County, Cynthiana, p. 121A.
